    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessFrame

        public ProcessFrame(ProcessSettings processSettings,
                    java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,MappedObjects> idMap)
        ProcessFrame constructor takes in processSettings which tell about the various image processing settings during frame processing. idMap is the mapping of card ids to student ids and the mapping of options {W,X,Y,Z} to {A,B,C,D}
        Parameters:
        processSettings - ProcessSettings object specifying settings like adaptive thresholding, optionDisplay, idDisplay, card highlight and image inversion
        idMap - HashMap with actual id as key and MappedObjects as values. MappedObjects hold detected Id, mapped Id and ID specific option mapping

    • Method Detail

      • processThisFrame

        public StatsAndMat processThisFrame(org.opencv.core.Mat grayMat,
                                    org.opencv.core.Mat rgbaMat)
        This is the main image processing method from which other methods are called. The results from this method must be used to finalise options and display frame with card option and id drawn for each card in a frame.
        Parameters:
        grayMat - grayscale matrix from the raw camera feed.
        rgbaMat - rgba matrix from the raw camera feed.
        Returns:
        StatsAndMat object that hold the question stats captured in a single camera frame along with the image matrix with card ID and Option

      • filterFrame

        private org.opencv.core.Mat filterFrame(org.opencv.core.Mat gray)
        filters the grayscale matrix to remove noise
        Parameters:
        gray - grayscale matrix of the camera feed
        Returns:
        filtered grayscale matrix

      • getContoursWithChild

        private java.util.List<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> getContoursWithChild(org.opencv.core.Mat filtered)
        This method returns both the parent and child contours in cases where the parent has a child contour
        Parameters:
        filtered - filtered grayscale matrix
        Returns:
        list containing MatOfPoint describing individual contours (both parent and child)

      • populateUsefulContourList

        private java.util.List<GoodSquare> populateUsefulContourList(java.util.List<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> tempContours,
                                                             org.opencv.core.Mat filtered,
                                                             org.opencv.core.Mat colorMat)
        Method to return only useful contours from among the parent-child contours returned from getContoursWithChild method
        Parameters:
        tempContours - List of parent-child contours
        filtered - filtered grayscale matrix
        colorMat - the rgba matrix from the camera feed
        Returns:
        a list of GoodSquare objects

      • getContourCenter

        private org.opencv.core.Point getContourCenter(org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint wrapper)
        Method to find centroid of a contour defined by a given MatOfPoint
        Parameters:
        wrapper - MatOfPoint describing a contour
        Returns:
        center Point

      • centerFix

        private CenterObjects centerFix(org.opencv.core.Point p1,
                                org.opencv.core.Mat filtered)
        Method to reposition centroid to ensure that it is equidistant from all vertices
        Parameters:
        p1 - centroid Point calculated by getContourCenter method
        filtered - filtered grayscale matrix
        Returns:
        centerAndPoints(CenterObjects) containing center Point and x-y coordinates as well

      • getCentroid

        private org.opencv.core.Point getCentroid(org.opencv.core.Point p1,
                                          org.opencv.core.Point p2,
                                          org.opencv.core.Point p3)
        Method to get the centroid of the triangle formed by the centers of the three squares grouped together on a single card
        Parameters:
        p1 - center of square 1
        p2 - center of square 2
        p3 - center of square 3
        Returns:
        centroid of triangle

      • rearrangePoints

        private org.opencv.core.Point[] rearrangePoints(org.opencv.core.Point p1,
                                                org.opencv.core.Point p2,
                                                org.opencv.core.Point p3,
                                                org.opencv.core.Point hole)
        Method to rearrange points and always assign the same label to the centers of the three squares
        Parameters:
        p1 - center of square 1
        p2 - center of square 2
        p3 - center of square 3
        hole - center of the card
        Returns:
        array of Point containing set of rearranged points

      • decodeId

        private int decodeId(org.opencv.core.Point p1,
                     org.opencv.core.Point pivot,
                     org.opencv.core.Point p3,
                     org.opencv.core.Point hole,
                     org.opencv.core.Mat colorMat)
        Method to find the card id
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point p1
        pivot - Point pivot (between p1 and p2)
        p3 - Point p3
        hole - Point hole (center of the card, also the midpoint of p1-p3
        colorMat - rgba Mat of the camera feed
        Returns:
        int idval i.e the decoded id

      • getIdCenter

        private org.opencv.core.Point getIdCenter(org.opencv.core.Point hole,
                                          org.opencv.core.Point pivot)
        Method to locate the center of the id quadrant
        Parameters:
        hole - center Point of the card
        pivot - center of the square diagonally opposite id quadrant center
        Returns:
        center of the id quadrant

      • binary2decimal

        private int binary2decimal(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> tempIdList)
        Method to get id value from the intensity values
        Parameters:
        tempIdList - list containing the intensity values at the 9 id points
        Returns:
        int card ID as calculated

      • decodeOption

        private java.lang.Object[] decodeOption(org.opencv.core.Point p1,
                                        org.opencv.core.Point pivot,
                                        org.opencv.core.Point p3,
                                        org.opencv.core.Point hole,
                                        org.opencv.core.Point centroid)
        Method to decode option and fix p1, p2 position relative two pivot
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point p1
        pivot - Point pivot
        p3 - Point p3
        hole - Point hole (card center, triangle(p1-pivot-p3) hypotenuse midpoint)
        centroid - centroid of the triangle(p1-pivot-p3)
        Returns:
        object array with decoded option and rearranged points

      • groupNeighbors

        private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Point>> groupNeighbors(java.util.List<GoodSquare> goodSquareList)
        Method to group detected contours in groups of three based on distance between them
        Parameters:
        goodSquareList - list of all the useful contours
        Returns:
        mapping of squares to cards

      • drawOptionsAndIds

        private org.opencv.core.Mat drawOptionsAndIds(org.opencv.core.Mat colorMat,
                                              org.opencv.core.Mat filteredMat,
                                              java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Point>> groupedCenterList)
        Method to draw ID and option on the matrix
        Parameters:
        colorMat - rgba matrix
        filteredMat - filtered grayscale matrix
        groupedCenterList - list containing centers of squares belonging to same card
        Returns:
        rgba mat with id and options

      • getMappedOption

        private int getMappedOption(int option,
                            int id)
        Method to get mapped option from {W,X,Y,Z} to {A,B,C,D} mapping
        Parameters:
        option - detected option
        id - detected id
        Returns:
        mapped option number

        Method calling other methods for deciding option and id
        Parameters:

        colorMat - rgba matrix
        Returns:
